titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow permanent look-through treatment of payments between related foreign corporations.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow permanent look-through treatment of payments between related foreign corporations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax rule exempting dividends, interest, rents, and royalties received or accrued from certain controlled foreign corporations by a related entity from treatment as foreign holding company income (thus permitting tax deferral of such income).
